> Nightlight Nodded, she stood up with fear in her face. she was ready to follow Rodimus

Rodimus tapped his code on the door and it slid open. He stepped out
of the chamber and looked around for a moment. He nodded, satisfied
that there were no intruders in the hall. He looked back at Nightlight
and motioned for her to follow.

With a grinding of gears he shifted into his vehicular mode and opened his door.

"Come on." he said as he gunned his engine. "I will will protect you.
We need to head towards the throne room. If there is anywhere that is
more protected in this place it is there."

He flipped on his lights and once Nightlight had gotten in he took
off, burning rubber as he moved!

OOC: Remember, Rodimus and Nightlight should be unaware of Tuscon's
intrusion, so this since like a good way to bring everyone together.
Rodimus acting in ignorance :)

Preston
